Table of Contents

Namespace osu.Framework.Input

Classes

ButtonEventManager<TButton>

Manages state and events for a single button.

CustomInputManager

An InputManager implementation which allows managing of InputHandlers manually.

InputManager
InputResampler

Reduces cursor input to relevant nodes and corners that noticably affect the cursor path. If the input is a raw/HD input this won't omit any input nodes. Set SmoothRawInput to true to keep behaviour for HD inputs.

JoystickAxisEventManager
JoystickButtonEventManager
KeyEventManager

Manages state events for a single key.

MidiKeyEventManager
MouseButtonEventManager

Manages state and events (click, drag and double-click) for a single mouse button.

PassThroughInputManager

An InputManager with an ability to use parent InputManager's input.

PlatformActionContainer

Provides actions that are expected to have different key bindings per platform. The framework will always contain one top-level instance of this class, but extra instances can be created to handle events that should trigger specifically on a focused drawable. Will send repeat events by default.

ReadableKeyCombinationProvider
TabletAuxiliaryButtonEventManager
TabletPenButtonEventManager
TextInputSource

A source from which we can retrieve user text input. Generally hides a native implementation from the game framework.

TouchEventManager

A manager that manages states and events for a single touch.

UserInputManager

Structs

JoystickAxis
Touch

Represents a touch structure that provides a touch source and current position.

Interfaces

IFocusManager
IHandleGlobalKeyboardInput

Denotes that this class handles keyboard input globally.

IRequireHighFrequencyMousePosition

Guarantees that a drawable will receive at least one OnMouseMove position update per update frame (in addition to any input-triggered occurrences).

ISourceGeneratedHandleInputCache
ISuppressKeyEventLogging

Marker interface which suppresses logging of keyboard input events. Useful for password fields, where user input should not be logged.

ConfineMouseMode
FrameworkAction
JoystickAxisSource
JoystickButton
MidiKey
PlatformAction
TabletAuxiliaryButton
TabletPenButton
TouchSource

A collection of available touch sources used for touch input methods.

Delegates

TextInputSource.ImeCompositionDelegate

Fired on a new IME composition.
